SinglePacketRequest Class Reference

Subclass to Request used to send one RequestPacket and receive one ReplyPacket. More...

Public Member Functions

  • SinglePacketRequest (uint16 reqID, PacketContainer *cont)
    Creates one request that should be used to send a single packet to one of the modules.

    Destructs the request and the answer if it hasn't been collected.

Detailed Description

Subclass to Request used to send one RequestPacket and receive one ReplyPacket.

Member Function Documentation

virtual PacketContainer* SinglePacketRequest::getAnswer (   )  [virtual]
 

Get the answer to this request.

{ { NB!} You can only use this method once to get the answer. Subsequent calls to it will return NULL.}

Returns:
A packetcontainer containing the answer to the request the first time it's called. NULL the other times.

Reimplemented from Request.
